feed.title: DAVx⁵ Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Rewrite DebugInfoActivity to M3 by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/744
  • Rewrite WifiPermissionsActivity to M3 by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/791
  • Fix padding for show only personal by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/807

Bug fixes

  • RefreshCollectionsWorker causes app to crash when the service is invalid by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/743
  • AccountsScreen: move navigation drawer to foreground so that it overlays FABs when open by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/765
  • Pre-select per-contact categories for login type NextcloudLogin by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/774
  • Start at LoginDetails page if logging in via intent by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/772
  • Fix widget colors by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/799
  • Fix setup through nextcloud app (intent) not working by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/782
  • Fix last sync time not being set for address books (closes #810) by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/812
  • MKCALENDAR: wrap supported components in <CALDAV:supported-calendar-co… by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/816

Refactoring

  • Add M3 theme and apply to AboutActivity by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/731
  • WebDAV Mounts UI: M3, refactoring by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/736
  • Rewrite AccountsActivity to M3 by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/749
  • Rewrite AccountActivity to M3 by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/752
  • Rewrite RenameAccountDialog to M3 by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/768
  • Rewrite WelcomePage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/754
  • Switched CalDAV and CardDAV tab positions by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/769
  • Replace DavUtils.lastSegmentOfUrl by UrlUtils.lastSegment by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/767
  • Use hiltViewModel for creating ViewModels with parameters in new Screen architecture by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/776
  • Rewrite PermissionsIntroPage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/758
  • Intro pages: use Hilt for dependency injection by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/779
  • Don't listen for account changes all the time by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/780
  • Rewrite TasksIntroPage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/760
  • Inject SyncDispatcher over Hilt by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/784
  • Rewrite BatteryOptimizationsPage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/747
  • Added M3 theme to intro pages by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/756
  • Rewrite AppSettingsActivity to M3 by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/792
  • M3 tweaks by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/796
  • Rewrite AccountSettingsActivity to M3 by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/795
  • Drop M2 (everything is M3 now) by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/797
  • Orange progress indicator bar by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/803
  • Increased icon size and text size for accounts list by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/813
  • Last M3 Tweaks by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/817

Other changes

  • Rewrite OpenSourcePage to M3 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/755
  • Fix login detail pages loosing user changes on rotation / re-creation (closes #775) by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/778
  • AccountSettingsActivity: make canAccessWifiSsid live-capable by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/732
  • Log last sync time per collection service and URL by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/702
  • More DI using Hilt by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/789
  • Fix color picker size by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/808

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.3.16.1-ose...v4.4-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.0.1-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • PreferenceRepository.observeAsFlow: emit initial value by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/822
  • App settings: mention that verbose logs can be viewed in debug info by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/824

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4-ose...v4.4.0.1-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.1-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Add Push Subscription Management by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/800
  • Implement basic Push functionality by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/856
  • Replace AppIntro by Compose Pager by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/848

Bug fixes

  • [Google] Allow login with custom domains again by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/833
  • Show CalDAV/CardDAV/Webcal tab when there's at least one item by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/839
  • Fix GMD tests by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/867
  • Show CalDAV/CardDAV tab when the respective service is present by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/868

Refactoring

  • Define toolchain version; update dependencies by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/834
  • Extract RefreshCollectionsWorker; move some (HomeSet)Dao calls to repository by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/845
  • Observable collections repository by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/829
  • [DI] Use constructor injection for SyncManager sub-classes by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/874

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.0.1-ose...v4.4.1-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.1.1-ose
entry.content:
Fixed a bug where scheduled sync would not trigger reliably anymore.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.1-ose...v4.4.1.1-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.2-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • [UI] Show push support status in collection details by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/961

Bug fixes

  • Fix: Syncer synchronizes only once by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/910
  • Create interface for startup plugins by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/915
  • Debug info: Sync interval "0 min" when actually -1 (manual) by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/928
  • Tests: don't create account as long as Hilt is not ready by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/939
  • WebDAV mounts: fix quota view by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/945

Refactoring

  • Replace Apache Commons by native calls/Guava by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/883
  • Use proper DI for Syncer implementations by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/889
  • Replaced "Create" by "Add" when creating accounts by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/892
  • Remove address books sync authority and content provider by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/877
  • Provide collection to SyncManager by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/881
  • Refactor logging by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/906
  • Get rid of Apache Commons by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/901
  • Use DI for AccountSettings and Android tests by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/911
  • Update dnsjava, use desugaring with nio, refactor DNS resolving by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/917
  • WebDAV cache: re-factor using Guava and Hilt by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/921
  • Re-factor Notifications and various Utils to DI by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/924
  • SyncWorker: use Provider for lazy injection by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/925
  • DB: some missing indices by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/890
  • [DI] Use @Inject lateinit var for abstract classes by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/929
  • Remove obsolete Logger object by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/930
  • Use AccountRepository to get list of accounts by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/938
  • Simplify InitCalendarProviderRule by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/940
  • Generalize syncer by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/907
  • SyncManager: pass collection directly by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/927

Dependencies

  • Bump dnsjava:dnsjava from 3.5.3 to 3.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/933
  • Update ical4android, specify ical4j log level by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/946

Other changes

  • Tasks screen: adapt padding and text by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/898
  • Backport minor changes from non-ose by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/941
  • Update dav4jvm for better logging by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/956
  • Suppress dnsjava warning because of missing Context by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/959

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/933

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.1-ose...v4.4.2-ose
